Libraries of the Future .A Licklider, J.C.R. This report of research on concepts and problems of "Libraries of the Future" records the result of a two-year inquiry into the applicability of some of the newer techniques for handling information to what goes at present by the name of library work - i.e, the operations connected with assembling information in recorded form and of organizing and making it available for use. .X 3	2	907 13	1	907 24	1	907 37	1	907 42	1	907 50	1	907 60	1	907 61	1	907 62	1	907 63	1	907 66	1	907 120	1	907 122	1	907 131	1	907 136	1	907 152	2	907 164	1	907 166	1	907 172	5	907 175	1	907 178	2	907 224	1	907 281	1	907 292	1	907 298	1	907 360	2	907 374	1	907 381	1	907 395	1	907 419	1	907 421	1	907 456	1	907 458	1	907 473	1	907 475	1	907 481	1	907 491	1	907 507	1	907 514	1	907 520	1	907 523	1	907 554	1	907 575	1	907 579	1	907 591	1	907 595	1	907 599	1	907 603	1	907 615	1	907 619	1	907 620	1	907 621	1	907 623	1	907 625	1	907 630	1	907 664	1	907 714	1	907 735	1	907 752	1	907 761	1	907 780	1	907 783	1	907 795	1	907 796	1	907 798	1	907 822	2	907 835	1	907 837	1	907 839	1	907 849	1	907 850	1	907 851	1	907 855	1	907 902	1	907 903	1	907 906	1	907 907	26	907 908	1	907 965	1	907 968	1	907 1011	1	907 1089	1	907 1115	1	907 1209	2	907 1212	1	907 1219	2	907 1255	1	907 1268	3	907 1286	1	907 1289	1	907 1294	1	907 1380	1	907 1394	1	907 1402	2	907 1407	1	907 1417	1	907 1418	1	907 1426	3	907 1446	1	907 1447	1	907 1447	1	907
